name: Mining Hazard
description:
This game was made for Trijam-214. The theme was "Don't shoot!"

Controls:
Click mining drills to temporarily disable them to allow minecarts to pass safely. Click green crystals for score.

This is the second game I've ever built. I would've made it more fun with more time. I think the challenge could be better paced / balanced. Either way, it was still fun to work on!

I used many assets:

Tileset: https://heyitswidmo.itch.io/caves-rails-tileset

Mining drill: https://zintoki.itch.io/ground-shaker

Crystals: https://thescrawlhive.itch.io/green-crystals

Laser: https://retsnail-assets.itch.io/laserbeamfx

SFX: https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack

Music: https://ansimuz.itch.io/mystery-music-collection-pack-1
